text: I've been working on BetaHealth's Azure-based data analytics platform. It's a game-changer for patient care. Collaborating with healthcare professionals has been invaluable.
AlphaCorp's AWS-powered supply chain optimization project has been both challenging and rewarding. AWS services like EC2 and SageMaker have made a real difference.
Data security and compliance have been my top priorities in BetaHealth's Azure project. It's vital to protect patient information while advancing healthcare.
